name: weathermate
0:
”Alexa open weather mate”
”Alexa ask weather mate for weather in london”
”Alexa ask weather mate what is the weather in London”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: weather mate
des:
Simple Alexa Skill for your daily weather forecasting. This skill gives the weather status of the cities around the world you ask.

Questions or comments? Contact the developer via email: nikhil@tiltlabs.io
*Note* use the utterance 'Alexa open weather mate' to invoke the skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
